message.content:
cs.LG, cs.CL, cs.AI, cs.IR, cs.CV. 

The paper proposes a discriminative learning approach for supervised Latent Dirichlet Allocation (LDA) model using Back Propagation (BP-sLDA) and applies it to develop a new learning method for the traditional unsupervised LDA model (BP-LDA). The approach involves the use of mirror descent algorithm for maximum a posterior inference and back propagation over a deep architecture together with stochastic gradient/mirror descent for model parameter estimation. This suggests that the paper could belong to several arXiv CS sub-categories such as cs.LG (Machine Learning), cs.CL (Computation and Language), cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence), cs.IR (Information Retrieval), and cs.CV (Computer Vision).
